margin-top.name: margin-top
margin-top.appliesTo: all elements except internal table elements
margin-top.percentages: refer to logical width of containing block
margin-top.computedValue: the keyword auto or a computed <length-percentage> value

margin-right.name: margin-right
margin-right.appliesTo: all elements except internal table elements
margin-right.percentages: refer to logical width of containing block
margin-right.computedValue: the keyword auto or a computed <length-percentage> value

margin-bottom.name: margin-bottom
margin-bottom.appliesTo: all elements except internal table elements
margin-bottom.percentages: refer to logical width of containing block
margin-bottom.computedValue: the keyword auto or a computed <length-percentage> value

margin-left.name: margin-left
margin-left.appliesTo: all elements except internal table elements
margin-left.percentages: refer to logical width of containing block
margin-left.computedValue: the keyword auto or a computed <length-percentage> value

margin.name: margin
margin.appliesTo: all elements except internal table elements
margin.percentages: refer to logical width of containing block

padding-top.name: padding-top
padding-top.appliesTo: all elements except: internal table elements other than table cells
padding-top.percentages: refer to logical width of containing block

padding-right.name: padding-right

padding-right.percentages: refer to logical width of containing block

padding-bottom.percentages: refer to logical width of containing block

padding.appliesTo: all elements except: internal table elements other than table cells
